field_text_formatted.value:
That's a good question, and as I write these specific words I don't yet have the answer. But if you are reading these words, then it does.

I'm pretty confident it will work through, because...

Druxt uses a Slot based Wrapper theming system for all the core Vue components. This allows the frontend developer, in this case me, to create a correctly named component in the Nuxt components directory, like nuxt/components/druxt/field/LayoutParagraphs.vue, allowing full control over the rendered markup of the field.
